item.title: Cozy city puzzle game River Towns announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/cozy-city-puzzle-game-river-towns-announced-for-pc

Publishers Metaroot and Stray Fawn Publishing, and developer Frogsong Studios have announced River Towns, a cozy city puzzle game. It will be available for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced. A demo is available now. A Kickstarter campaign seeking €10,000 in funding was also launched.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

In River Towns, you place differently shaped buildings and make them fit into a limited area. Combine unique districts into a vibrant living city and help restore our River Towns.

Puzzle a River Town

Each of the three districts has its own set of shapes which are shuffled randomly. This makes every game you play a new and unique puzzle to solve. The different district’s unique and vibrant architecture combines into beautiful little towns along the river. As the town grows, more townspeople move in and bring life back into this old and broken world.

Earn Points

Buildings also belong to differently colored districts which score bonus points when connected into large clusters. Getting a good score on each level awards stars, which restores the world and also unlocks more levels.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Each Level is Different

The beginning of each town starts with you restoring this part of the dried up river and surrounding it with buildings. Throughout the game you encounter other objectives, such as gold to collect, trees to regrow and old monuments to rebuild. This turns the difficulty and possibility of collecting points completely upside down.

Progression

With every city you piece together, the world becomes a little more verdant. When you complete a level, you will receive a gold, silver or bronze marker, depending on your score. Once you have enough points, you can move on to the next world.

Key Features

  • Piece together beautiful towns along the river.
  • Earn points in various ways.
  • Enjoy many unique levels with ever-changing mechanics.
  • Restore nature and rebuild the monuments of the old, broken world.
  • Share your towns with photo mode.
  • Compare your score with your friends.

item.title: Period drama simulation game Wylde Society announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/period-drama-simulation-game-wylde-society-announced-for-pc

  • PC

A prequel to Wylde Flowers.

Studio Drydock has announced Wylde Society, a prequel to its previous game Wylde Flowers and a period drama simulation game about “magic, social events, and all things elegant.” It will be available for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Studio Drydock:

About

Step into the elegant heels of Vivian Wylde, witch, socialite and host, in period drama sim Wylde Society! Build, run and customize your magical boarding house in turn of the century Fairhaven. Host splendid events, expand your witchcraft, and influence the town. Who will you invite for tea?

Key Features

  • Step Back in Time – Wylde Society takes place in the vibrant island of Fairhaven at the turn of the century. Enjoy and admire its Edwardian fashions, architecture, society rules and etiquette.
  • Run your Magical Boarding House – Build, renovate and customize your magical boarding house! Invite, welcome and care for your tenants. Some may stay only a season, but with your help, others may find reasons to stay.
  • Host Splendid Parties – As a local socialite, you will plan and host a range of fancy events including tea parties, dinners, and balls. Choose everything like the guest list, food, drink welcome toast, and seating plan. Will you keep the peace or instigate drama?
  • Explore the Beyond – At the turn of the century, seances were very popular, but telling a true mystic from a charlatan was tricky! Vivian has a true knack for contacting spirits. Will you help Fairhaven’s departed with their unfinished business?
  • Befriend Magical Creatures – Discover and collect familiars from cats to otters. These companions will not only help you with their witchy skills, but will also keep you company, even on your broom!

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Sugardew Island launches in March 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/sugardew-island-launches-in-march-2025

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Cozy farm shop simulation game gets a release window.

Cozy farm shop simulation game Sugardew Island will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam in March 2025, developer rokaplay announced. Physical editions will also be available for PlayStation 5 and Switch via distributor Silver Lining Interactive, with pre-orders available here.

Here is an overview of the game, via rokaplay:

About

Inspired by the beloved DS Harvest Moon games, Sugardew Island is a love letter to the cozy genre, where you can unwind, relax and enjoy hours of delightful gameplay running your own farm shop on a quiet and peaceful island.

On your cozy gaming journey, you will try your hand at running your own farm shop, selling goods you farm on the island. Care for your animals, grow crops, gather resources and complete Harmony Tree quests to restore balance for the cute Forest Folk inhabitants.

Run Your Own Farm Shop, Without Any Pressure!

Sugardew Island is an intentionally uncomplicated cozy farm shop sim, crafted by a tiny indie dev team. We developed Sugardew Island so you can unwind, relax, and enjoy your beloved genre.

After a surprising storm and a shipwreck, your journey begins as you awaken on a deserted island. To continue your adventure, you must collect Harmony by selling goods to the forest folk, healing the island and overcoming the thorns

Take care of your animals and your farm, sell your goods to the cute Forest Folk, upgrade your farm and fulfil small orders from the Harmony Tree to fill the tiny island with life again.

Key Features

  • Farming – Take care of your plants, make fertilizer and sell your farm produce.
  • Your Farm Shop – Sell items in your shop and negotiate with the Forest Folk for prices.
  • Resource Gathering – Collect wood, stones, and weeds for farm improvements.
  • Character Editor – Customize your character’s look to create your perfect persona.
  • Animals – Feed, interact & build bonds with animals for eggs and milk.
  • Pet Companions – Give names to pets, interact with them, and let them follow you around the island.
  • Harmony Tree Quests – Fulfill orders to heal the Harmony Tree and upgrade the small island.
  • Trader Tomte – Purchase seeds, animals, and more from the friendly trader.
  • Upgrade System – Improve your house, barn, and tools to enhance efficiency.

item.title: Train life simulation adventure game Locomoto announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/train-life-simulation-adventure-game-locomoto-announced-for-pc

Amplifier Game Invest subsidiary Green Tile Digital has announced Locomoto, a life simulation adventure game “that captures the timeless romance of travelling on a train.” It will launch for PC via Steam in 2025.

“Locomoto was born out of our love of those special moments that make train journeys magical,” said Green Tile Digital CEO Ben Clarke in a press release. “We wanted to create more than just another life sim game—we wanted to capture that unique feeling of possibility and connection that comes from sharing a journey with others.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Green Tile Digital:

Developed by Green Tile Digital, Locomoto transforms the traditional concept of riding a train into a heartwarming life-sim adventure where every station brings new stories and every passenger adds character to players’ ever-evolving railway home.

In Locomoto, players embark on their journey with a modest train that serves as a blank canvas for creativity and expression on the backdrop of a warm, lo-fi world full of life. Key gameplay features of the game include:

  • Crafting a Dream Train, where each wagon can be transformed using furniture crafted from resources discovered and earned throughout players’ travels. Splash colors, select styles and create specialized spaces from cozy lounge cars to elegant dining carriages; all immersing players in the fantasy of owning and operating their very own train.
  • Reconnecting a World through meeting and interacting with the locals as players travel between towns and reach new destinations. Tending to the needs of the passengers that board the train will uncover their stories that expand the vibrant, lo-fi world, and as more stations become available these stories will unravel into a rich tapestry of fates and aspirations.
  • A Relaxing Blend as Locomoto seamlessly mixes train management, crafting and relationship building, sprinkling the unique magic of train travel on top. The world is filled with resources to gather and transform into furniture, decorations and essential items through intuitive crafting menus. Each completed quest unlocks new items and blueprints, and advances the story forward.
  • Lo-Fi Vibes & Big Feels as Locomoto’s attention to detail shines through, whether it’s the carefully crafted lo-fi soundtrack accompanying every journey or a dynamic day/night cycle to create ever-changing moods. Locomoto welcomes players of all experience levels and encourages progression at one’s own pace, and with no fail states, players can enjoy a stress-free environment that encourages experimentation and personal expression

item.title: Tales of Seikyu launches in Early Access in spring 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/tales-of-seikyu-launches-in-early-access-in-spring-2025

  • PC

Embark on your new life in Seikyu.

Yokai fantasy farming life simulation game Tales of Seikyu will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam in spring 2025, publisher Fireshine Games and developer ACE Entertainment announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Fireshine Games:

Developed by ACE Entertainment and published by Fireshine Games, the publishing team behind indie gems Core Keeper and Shadows of Doubt, Tales of Seikyu invites players to a tranquil countryside island to restore their ancestral farmhouse and grow their farmstead. Cultivate crops, raise livestock, craft furniture, and cook meals, while renovating your farmhouse, expanding its rooms, and decorating it to reflect your unique vision.

Shapeshift into magical Yokai forms to take care of your homestead and explore the world. Soar freely in the skies as the Crow Tengu, dive deep for sunken treasure as a slime, or till the ground of your farm as a boar.

Experience the island’s seasonal changes, help the townsfolk with quests, and take part in festivals and mini-games. Find your soulmate with 14 romance partners, each with their own unique personalities and heart-warming stories.
